import { useState } from "react"; import Styles from "../components/styles"; import lang from "../components/language"; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system'; export default () => { const [currLang, setCurrLang] = useState("english"); return
{lang[currLang].header.our_mission} Terms

{lang[currLang].title}

{lang[currLang].subtitle}

The CoronaForms Mission

We have seen the significant economic impact of the coronavirus on many people, typically the least well-paid and those self-employed or working in informal environments.

Some governments and banks have announced economic measures to help with loans, safeguard jobs, guarantee wages and support the self-employed, but there is a lack of clarity in many countries about eligibility and the necessary paperwork behind it.

CoronaForms is here to help! we use technology to make coronavirus reliefs more accessable for everyone.

 CoronaForms.org {new Date().getFullYear()} - Made with ❤️ in Israel
}
